mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (username, password, role, image_url, phone, email, statu) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{role}, CASE WHEN #{role} = 1 THEN 'https://ikun-edu.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/teacher_default.jpg' WHEN #{role} = 2 THEN 'https://ikun-edu.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/student_default.jpg' END, #{phone}, #{email}, CASE WHEN #{role} = 1 THEN 2 WHEN #{role} = 2 THEN 1 END);
mapper.select: select username, phone, email, statu from user where role = 1 and statu in (0,1);
select username, phone, email, statu, creat_time from user where role = 1 and statu = 2;
